name: dehatehehe
greetingText: I really like your name btw -))
wishText: May the 1600 SAT always be with you! ;)
text1: Tomorrow is the day u take the first SAT -((
textInChatBox: u may feel anxious, but don't stress out... calm down and do your best...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Chill, be confident and take it easy!
outroText: Okay, now just rest well, and you'll do great
replayText: no matter what the score is, you are still the best! (click here if u want to watch it again btw)
